Html:
Hello,

I can see silverlight files in the source code so I am baffled as to why the DLL gives me the error that it was not built against the silverlight runtime error message when I try to use it.

Anyone have any ideas on how to fix this problem?

Thanks!
To be honest I have never tried silverlight so can't easily answer. Where did you get the library from, here, source, or nuget?
I ended up downloading the source and grabbing the dlls from the ExcelDataReader.Silverlight Project file and it worked.
I grabbed the files from here and thanks for the speedy response!
